### shouldBeDeferred() {#a0e5ee7a451482722a4446bdf208df9fc}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool shouldBeDeferred (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42; Caller, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> &amp; CalleeTTI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost">InlineCost</a> IC, int &amp; TotalSecondaryCost, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost">InlineCost</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;CB)&gt; GetInlineCost)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Return true if inlining of CB can block the caller from being inlined which is proved to be more beneficial.

<code>IC</code> is the estimated inline cost associated with callsite <code>CB</code>. <code>TotalSecondaryCost</code> will be set to the estimated cost of inlining the caller if <code>CB</code> is suppressed for inlining.

Definition at line <a href="#l00249">249</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineadvisor-cpp">InlineAdvisor.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return true if inlining of CB can block the caller from being</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="comment">/// inlined which is proved to be more beneficial. \\p IC is the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="comment">/// estimated inline cost associated with callsite \\p CB.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\p TotalSecondaryCost will be set to the estimated cost of inlining the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="comment">/// caller if \\p CB is suppressed for inlining.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249" lineLink="#a0e5ee7a451482722a4446bdf208df9fc"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="#a0e5ee7a451482722a4446bdf208df9fc">shouldBeDeferred</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;Caller, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> &amp;CalleeTTI,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal">                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost">InlineCost</a> IC, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;TotalSecondaryCost,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal">                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost">InlineCost</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;CB)&gt; GetInlineCost) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For now we only handle local or inline functions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Caller-&gt;hasLocalLinkage() &amp;&amp; !Caller-&gt;hasLinkOnceODRLinkage())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the cost of inlining CB is non-positive, it is not going to prevent the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// caller from being inlined into its callers and hence we don&#39;t need to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// defer.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost/#a5aa025661dacbb8cf0db3f6220d91f49">getCost</a>() &lt;= 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to detect the case where the current inlining candidate caller (call</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it B) is a static or linkonce-ODR function and is an inlining candidate</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// elsewhere, and the current candidate callee (call it C) is large enough</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that inlining it into B would make B too big to inline later. In these</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// circumstances it may be best not to inline C into B, but to inline B into</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// its callers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This only applies to static and linkonce-ODR functions because those are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// expected to be available for inlining in the translation units where they</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are used. Thus we will always have the opportunity to make local inlining</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// decisions. Importantly the linkonce-ODR linkage covers inline functions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and templates in C++.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: All of this logic should be sunk into getInlineCost. It relies on</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the internal implementation of the inline cost metrics rather than</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// treating them as truly abstract units etc.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="normal">  TotalSecondaryCost = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The candidate cost to be imposed upon the current function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CandidateCost = IC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost/#a5aa025661dacbb8cf0db3f6220d91f49">getCost</a>() - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the caller has local linkage and can be inlined to all its callers, we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// can apply a huge negative bonus to TotalSecondaryCost.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ApplyLastCallBonus = Caller-&gt;hasLocalLinkage() &amp;&amp; !Caller-&gt;hasOneUse();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This bool tracks what happens if we DO inline C into B.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> InliningPreventsSomeOuterInline = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumCallerUsers = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> &#42;U : Caller-&gt;users()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &#42;CS2 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;CallBase&gt;</a>(U);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If this isn&#39;t a call to Caller (it could be some other sort</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of reference) skip it.  Such references will prevent the caller</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// from being removed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!CS2 || CS2-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase/#a2b1ae7cf1bafdd43d1fee4c6ad0a2913">getCalledFunction</a>() != Caller) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><Highlight kind="normal">      ApplyLastCallBonus = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost">InlineCost</a> IC2 = GetInlineCost(&#42;CS2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><Highlight kind="normal">    ++NumCallerCallersAnalyzed;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!IC2) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="normal">      ApplyLastCallBonus = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IC2.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost/#ad166c05849a74acb5e56415f7533e8ad">isAlways</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// See if inlining of the original callsite would erase the cost delta of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// this callsite. We subtract off the penalty for the call instruction,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// which we would be deleting.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IC2.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost/#ad1798a4114dad2820cb163dc5b2db758">getCostDelta</a>() &lt;= CandidateCost) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><Highlight kind="normal">      InliningPreventsSomeOuterInline = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="normal">      TotalSecondaryCost += IC2.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost/#a5aa025661dacbb8cf0db3f6220d91f49">getCost</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="normal">      NumCallerUsers++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!InliningPreventsSomeOuterInline)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If all outer calls to Caller would get inlined, the cost for the last</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// one is set very low by getInlineCost, in anticipation that Caller will</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// be removed entirely.  We did not account for this above unless there</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is only one caller of Caller.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ApplyLastCallBonus)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="normal">    TotalSecondaryCost -= CalleeTTI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a751d7804543eb7033df99f99d5aa1dc1">getInliningLastCallToStaticBonus</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If InlineDeferralScale is negative, then ignore the cost of primary</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// inlining -- IC.getCost() multiplied by the number of callers to Caller.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="#a1277166bb83134f665a44bedcb4a38f9">InlineDeferralScale</a> &lt; 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TotalSecondaryCost &lt; IC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost/#a5aa025661dacbb8cf0db3f6220d91f49">getCost</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TotalCost = TotalSecondaryCost + IC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost/#a5aa025661dacbb8cf0db3f6220d91f49">getCost</a>() &#42; NumCallerUsers;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Allowance = IC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost/#a5aa025661dacbb8cf0db3f6220d91f49">getCost</a>() &#42; <a href="#a1277166bb83134f665a44bedcb4a38f9">InlineDeferralScale</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TotalCost &lt; Allowance;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">llvm &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a80c2c1a9a2f2eec5c7f3bd5485012802"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab89f1db02887aa569176f0e29622eb47">operator&lt;&lt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;R, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ore/#a5ca06dfbc998afac005414d8e9b7c234">ore::NV</a> &amp;Arg) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RemarkT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aaf828eea7efcbbc84e0b3a0decdb8b44"><Highlight kind="normal">RemarkT &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab89f1db02887aa569176f0e29622eb47">operator&lt;&lt;</a>(RemarkT &amp;&amp;R, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost">InlineCost</a> &amp;IC) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ore">ore</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost/#ad166c05849a74acb5e56415f7533e8ad">isAlways</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
